text: I was just so lucky to have a wonderful life after a tough marriage.
author: Lynn Johnston

text: Each marriage has to be judged separately, and we never know what's going on in another person's marriage.
author: Mary Wesley

text: My father was a soldier and my mother was a great mover. She once counted up how many places she had lived in during the first 25 years of her marriage and it came to 20.
author: Mary Wesley

text: We can't destroy the inequities between men and women until we destroy marriage.
author: Robin Morgan

text: Marriage is overdone. As long as there are people, people are going to find it interesting.
author: Augusten Burroughs
